statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, payment_history FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_name, payment_history->>'total_payments' AS total_payments FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points < 50
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY loyalty_points
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 54321;
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id IN (98765, 45678);
SELECT reward_name, reward_points_required FROM reward_catalog WHERE reward_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM reward_catalog WHERE reward_points_required > 500;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name FROM reward_catalog WHERE reward_points_required < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, JSON_EXTRACT(payment_history, '$.latest_payment') AS latest_payment FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 3;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_members;
SELECT member_name, join_date FROM loyalty_members ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, total_points FROM loyalty_members WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, expiration_date FROM rewards WHERE available = true;
SELECT member_name, total_points FROM loyalty_members;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_members ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, total_points, transaction_date, amount FROM loyalty_members JOIN transactions ON loyalty_members.member_id = transactions.member_id;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, expiration_date FROM rewards WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY points_required ASC;
SELECT member_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM loyalty_members JOIN transactions ON loyalty_members.member_id = transactions.member_id GROUP BY member_name HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, reward_description FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, reward_description, reward_points FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id ORDER BY reward_points DESC;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE purchases.purchase_amount > 500 AND transactions.transaction_amount < 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC,purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_history FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_date, order_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM customers c JOIN rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, discount_amount FROM customers c LEFT JOIN discounts d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE discount_expiry > NOW();
